responses.rationale: Reports a numerical metric ('number of documented infected dairy herds') using a standard verb ('risen') and a neutral adverb ('rapidly').
The segment describes physical symptoms and duration, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics as defined by Q9.
Reports a numerical metric ('number of dairy herds') using a standard verb ('risen') and a neutral adverb ('rapidly').
Reports a numerical metric ('grown to include eight people') using a standard verb ('grown').
